name: gold-teeth
effect: The Safari Zone warden’s teeth, to be returned to him for hm04.
short_effect: The Safari Zone Warden’s dentures. Trade for HM04 (Strength).

flavor_text.emerald: Gold dentures lost by the SAFARI ZONE’s WARDEN.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A set of false teeth lost by the SAFARI ZONE’S WARDEN. It makes his smile sparkle.
